title: On Borel orbits of quadratic forms in characteristic 2
summary: We consider the spherical variety of quadratic forms over a quadratically closed field of characteristic 2, and determine its orbits for the action of the Borel subgroup of upper triangular matrices. We exhibit a connection between these orbits and the Catalan triangle numbers. In addition, we describe explicitly a natural Weyl group action on the set of Borel orbit double covers

AI.tldr: 在特征为2的二次闭域上，研究二次型的球面簇在Borel子群作用下的轨道分类，发现这些轨道与Catalan三角数存在联系，并描述了Weyl群在Borel轨道双覆盖上的自然作用。
AI.motivation: 研究特征为2的域上二次型的球面簇结构，探索Borel子群作用下的轨道分类问题，寻找与组合数学中Catalan数的联系。
AI.method: 考虑特征为2的二次闭域上的二次型球面簇，分析上三角矩阵构成的Borel子群在其上的作用，通过轨道分类建立与Catalan三角数的对应关系。
AI.result: 确定了Borel子群作用下的轨道分类，建立了这些轨道与Catalan三角数的明确对应关系，并描述了Weyl群在Borel轨道双覆盖上的自然作用。
AI.conclusion: 在特征为2的二次闭域上，二次型球面簇的Borel轨道与Catalan三角数存在深刻联系，Weyl群在轨道双覆盖上的作用为理解这一结构提供了新的视角。

title: A Difference Formula for Tensor-power Multiplicities
summary: A novel combinatorial formula is developed for for tensor product multiplicities in representation theory. We introduce a difference formula linking these multiplicities to restricted occupancy coefficients via a shifted operator. This method is extended to derive branching rules for subalgebras and is conjecturally applied to A-type Lie superalgebras.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种计算张量积重数的新组合公式，通过移位算子将其与受限占据系数联系起来，并推广到子代数的分支规则
AI.motivation: 在表示论中，张量积重数的计算是一个基本问题。传统方法可能复杂或计算量大，需要更简洁有效的组合公式来简化计算过程
AI.method: 开发了一种新颖的组合公式，通过移位算子将张量积重数与受限占据系数联系起来。该方法还扩展到推导子代数的分支规则，并推测性地应用于A型李超代数
AI.result: 建立了张量积重数与受限占据系数之间的差分公式联系，为表示论中的重数计算提供了新的组合工具
AI.conclusion: 提出的组合公式为张量积重数计算提供了新方法，可推广到子代数分支规则，对A型李超代数的应用具有潜在价值

title: Alperin's weight conjecture, Galois automorphisms, alternating sums, and functorial equivalences
summary: We show that functorial equivalences can offer new insight into the blockwise Galois Alperin weight conjecture (BGAWC). Inspired by Knörr and Robinson's work, we first formulate the BGAWC in terms of alternating sums indexed by chains of $p$-subgroups, and we also give a functorial reformulation in the Grothendieck group of diagonal $p$-permutation functors. We prove that these formulations are equivalent. We further show that if a functorial equivalence between a block with abelian defect group and its Brauer correspondent descends to the minimal field of the block, then the BGAWC holds for that block. Finally, we prove that Galois conjugate blocks are functorially equivalent over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero.

AI.tldr: 论文通过函子等价为块状Galois Alperin权猜想提供新视角，建立了链式表述与函子表述的等价性，证明了在特定条件下该猜想成立。
AI.motivation: 探索函子等价如何为块状Galois Alperin权猜想提供新的理解视角，建立更简洁的表述形式并证明特定情况下的猜想成立。
AI.method: 首先基于Knörr和Robinson的工作，用p-子群链的交替和表述BGAWC；然后在对角p-置换函子的Grothendieck群中给出函子化表述；证明这两种表述的等价性；进一步研究函子等价在块与Brauer对应之间的应用。
AI.result: 证明了BGAWC的链式表述与函子表述的等价性；证明了如果具有阿贝尔缺陷群的块与其Brauer对应之间的函子等价能下降到块的最小域，则BGAWC对该块成立；证明了Galois共轭块在特征零代数闭域上是函子等价的。
AI.conclusion: 函子等价为BGAWC提供了有力的新工具，建立了不同表述之间的等价关系，并在特定条件下验证了猜想的正确性，为后续研究开辟了新方向。

title: Non-weight modules over generalized Heisenberg-Virasoro algebra of rank two
summary:
In this paper, we study a class of non-weight modules over the generalized Heisenberg-Virasoro algebra of rank two $\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$. We construct a family of irreducible
  $\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$-modules, determine the isomorphism classes and show that these modules exhaust all the $\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$-modules that are free modules of rank one over the Cartan subalgebra.

AI.tldr: 研究广义Heisenberg-Virasoro代数$\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$上的一类非权模，构造了不可约模族，确定了同构类，并证明这些模穷尽了Cartan子代数上秩为一的自由模
AI.motivation: 研究广义Heisenberg-Virasoro代数上的非权模结构，特别是那些在Cartan子代数上秩为一的自由模，这类模在表示理论中具有重要意义
AI.method: 构造了一族不可约的$\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$-模，通过代数结构分析确定了这些模的同构类，并证明了这些模穷尽了所有在Cartan子代数上秩为一的自由模
AI.result: 成功构造了不可约模族，完全分类了这些模的同构类，并证明了这些模穷尽了所有满足条件的$\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$-模
AI.conclusion: 该研究完全分类了广义Heisenberg-Virasoro代数$\widetilde{L}(p_1, p_2)$上在Cartan子代数上秩为一的自由模，为相关代数结构的表示理论提供了重要结果

title: Left regular bands with symmetry
summary:
The representation theory of left regular band semigroup algebras is well-studied and known to have close connections with combinatorial topology, as established in the work of Margolis--Saliola--Steinberg ('15, '21). In this paper, we investigate the representation theory of the invariant subalgebras of left regular band semigroup algebras carrying the action of a finite group through the lens of group-equivariant combinatorial topology.
  We characterize when the invariant subalgebra is semisimple or commutative and examine the equivariant structure of the Peirce components of the semigroup algebra. For CW left regular bands, we interpret these Peirce components in terms of the equivariant topology of intervals in the support semilattice, yielding the Cartan invariants of the invariant subalgebras of left regular bands associated to CAT(0)-cube complexes. We also give a topological formula for the Peirce components for left regular bands with hereditary algebras. Finally, in specializing to left regular bands associated to geometric lattices, we explore generalizations of the Desarménién--Wachs derangement representation and their connections to Markov chains.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究左正则带半群代数的有限群作用不变子代数的表示理论，通过群等变组合拓扑方法分析其结构，包括半单性、交换性、Peirce分量等性质。
AI.motivation: 左正则带半群代数的表示理论已有深入研究并与组合拓扑密切相关，但对其在有限群作用下的不变子代数的表示理论尚未充分探索。本文旨在通过群等变组合拓扑的视角研究这些不变子代数的结构。
AI.method: 采用群等变组合拓扑方法，分析不变子代数的半单性和交换性条件，研究Peirce分量的等变结构，对CW左正则带通过支撑半格区间的等变拓扑解释Peirce分量，对遗传代数给出拓扑公式，并在几何格关联的左正则带中探索推广的错排表示。
AI.result: 刻画了不变子代数何时为半单或交换的条件，解释了CW左正则带中Peirce分量与支撑半格区间等变拓扑的关系，给出了CAT(0)-立方复形关联左正则带不变子代数的Cartan不变量，为遗传代数左正则带提供了Peirce分量的拓扑公式，并在几何格情形探索了错排表示的推广及其与马尔可夫链的联系。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了左正则带半群代数不变子代数表示理论与群等变组合拓扑的深刻联系，为理解这些代数结构提供了新的拓扑视角，并在特定情形下获得了具体结构描述和组合应用。

title: Some unipotent Arthur packets for p-adic split F4
summary: Let $G(k)$ be the split form of the simple exceptional p-adic group of type $F_4$, and let $\mathcal O = F_4(a_3)$ be the minimal distinguished nilpotent orbit. Our main result concerns the class of unipotent representations with cuspidal support at infinitesimal character $Λ$ determined by $\mathcal O$. These representations are parameterized by local systems, $\{(S, \mathcal L)\}$. We compute the characteristic cycles of the perverse sheaves $\text{IC}(S, \mathcal L)$ and determine all micro-packets in the sense of [Vo93]. In [CMBO24], the authors introduced a notion of weak Arthur packets in the p-adic setting. They conjectured that weak Arthur packets are unions of Arthur packets, in an appropriate sense. We verify that weak Arthur packets are unions of micro-packets.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了F4型p-adic例外群的单表示，计算了极小可别幂零轨道对应的不可约特征标簇的特征循环，验证了弱Arthur包是微包的并集。
AI.motivation: 研究F4型p-adic例外群的单表示理论，特别是与极小可别幂零轨道相关的表示，验证CMBO24中提出的弱Arthur包猜想在具体群上的表现。
AI.method: 使用几何表示论方法，计算与极小可别幂零轨道F4(a3)相关的不可约特征标簇的特征循环，分析微包结构，并与弱Arthur包理论进行比较。
AI.result: 计算了IC(S,L)的完整特征循环，确定了所有微包结构，并验证了弱Arthur包确实是微包的并集，支持了CMBO24中的猜想。
AI.conclusion: 在F4型p-adic例外群的具体情形下，弱Arthur包确实是微包的并集，这为CMBO24的猜想提供了具体验证，深化了对p-adic群表示理论中包结构关系的理解。

title: On stable equivalences of Morita type with twisted diagonal vertices
summary: We give a new proof, by using simplified terminology and notation, to a result of Puig stating that if a bimodule of two block algebras of finite groups over an algebraically closed field induces a stable equivalence of Morita type and has a twisted diagonal vertex, then it has an endopermutation module as a source. We also extend this result to arbitrary fields under a mild assumption.

AI.tldr: 本文对Puig关于有限群块代数双模的结果给出了新的证明，并扩展到任意域
AI.motivation: 简化Puig结果的证明术语和记号，并将结果从代数闭域扩展到任意域
AI.method: 使用简化的术语和记号重新证明Puig的结果，并在温和假设下扩展到任意域
AI.result: 证明了如果两个有限群块代数的双模诱导Morita型稳定等价且具有扭曲对角顶点，则该双模具有内置换模作为源；该结果在温和假设下对任意域成立
AI.conclusion: 通过简化证明方法，不仅重新证明了Puig的重要结果，还将其适用范围从代数闭域扩展到任意域，增强了该理论的普适性

title: Central elements and evaluation map for the quantum queer superalgebras
summary: We construct central elements in the quantum queer superalgebra $U_q(q_n)$ and in its affine counterpart $U_q(\widehat q_n)$. We also produce an epimorphism $ev:U_q(\widehat q_n)\to U_q(q_n)$ identical on the subalgebra isomorphic to $U_q(q_n)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文构造了量子queer超代数U_q(q_n)及其仿射对应U_q(̂q_n)的中心元素，并建立了从仿射版本到有限维版本的满射
AI.motivation: 研究量子queer超代数及其仿射版本的中心元素结构，建立两个代数之间的明确关系
AI.method: 构造量子queer超代数U_q(q_n)和仿射量子queer超代数U_q(̂q_n)的中心元素，并建立满射ev:U_q(̂q_n)→U_q(q_n)
AI.result: 成功构造了中心元素，建立了从仿射版本到有限维版本的满射，该满射在子代数U_q(q_n)上保持恒等
AI.conclusion: 该工作为量子queer超代数理论提供了重要的结构结果，建立了仿射版本与有限维版本之间的系统联系

title: On Poisson superalgebras in characteristic 2
summary: This paper is devoted to the study of Poisson superalgebras over fields of characteristic $2$. We investigate their representations, semidirect products, cohomology, formal deformations, and universal enveloping algebras. We also introduce Lie-Rinehart superalgebras in characteristic $2$ and clarify their connections with Poisson superalgebras. In particular, we show that the universal enveloping algebra of a Poisson superalgebra coincides with the universal enveloping algebra of an associated Lie-Rinehart superalgebra. We also compute examples and initiate the study of pre-Poisson superalgebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了特征2域上的泊松超代数，包括其表示、半直积、上同调、形式变形和泛包络代数，并引入了特征2下的Lie-Rinehart超代数，建立了与泊松超代数的联系。
AI.motivation: 研究特征2域上的泊松超代数理论，填补该领域在特征2情况下的研究空白，探索泊松超代数与Lie-Rinehart超代数在特征2下的联系。
AI.method: 采用代数结构理论方法，研究泊松超代数的表示理论、半直积构造、上同调理论、形式变形理论，并引入Lie-Rinehart超代数概念，建立两种代数结构之间的联系。
AI.result: 证明了泊松超代数的泛包络代数与相关Lie-Rinehart超代数的泛包络代数一致，计算了具体例子，并开始研究预泊松超代数。
AI.conclusion: 在特征2域上建立了泊松超代数与Lie-Rinehart超代数的深刻联系，为特征2下的代数结构理论提供了新的研究框架和方向。

title: Totally nonnegative Peterson variety and strongly dominant weight polytope
summary: We study the totally nonnegative part of the Peterson variety in arbitrary Lie type and establish its connection to the strongly dominant weight polytope. In particular, we prove that the totally nonnegative part of the Peterson variety is a regular CW-complex, which is homeomorphic to a cube as a cell-decomposed space. This confirms a conjecture of Rietsch for all Lie types.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了任意李类型下Peterson簇的全非负部分是一个正则CW复形，且同胚于一个立方体，从而证实了Rietsch猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究Peterson簇的全非负部分与强支配权多面体之间的关系，验证Rietsch关于该结构性质的猜想在所有李类型下都成立。
AI.method: 通过建立Peterson簇的全非负部分与强支配权多面体之间的连接，分析其拓扑和组合结构，证明其具有正则CW复形的性质。
AI.result: 证明了Peterson簇的全非负部分是一个正则CW复形，且作为胞腔分解空间同胚于一个立方体，从而在所有李类型下证实了Rietsch猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功建立了Peterson簇全非负部分与强支配权多面体之间的深刻联系，并完全解决了Rietsch猜想，为相关几何和组合结构的研究提供了重要结果。

title: Stable Brauer-Thrall II' conjecture for finite-dimensional Jacobian algebras
summary: We prove that finite-dimensional Jacobian algebras associated with non-degenerate quivers with potentials satisfy the stable Brauer-Thrall II' conjecture. In particular, this implies that the brick Brauer-Thrall II' conjecture (also known as the $τ$-Brauer-Thrall II' conjecture) holds for finite-dimensional Jacobian algebras.

AI.tldr: 证明了非退化箭图势的有限维雅可比代数满足稳定Brauer-Thrall II'猜想，从而推出砖块Brauer-Thrall II'猜想（τ-Brauer-Thrall II'猜想）对这类代数成立。
AI.motivation: 研究有限维雅可比代数在表示论中的性质，特别是验证这类代数是否满足表示论中的重要猜想——Brauer-Thrall II'猜想及其变体。
AI.method: 通过数学证明的方法，针对非退化箭图势构造的有限维雅可比代数，证明其满足稳定Brauer-Thrall II'猜想。证明过程可能涉及表示论、同调代数和箭图表示理论等技术。
AI.result: 成功证明了有限维雅可比代数（来自非退化箭图势）满足稳定Brauer-Thrall II'猜想，并由此推导出砖块Brauer-Thrall II'猜想（τ-Brauer-Thrall II'猜想）对这些代数也成立。
AI.conclusion: 该结果为有限维雅可比代数的表示论性质提供了重要支持，验证了Brauer-Thrall II'猜想在这一类代数中的成立，推动了表示论中相关猜想的研究进展。

title: On Jacobi sums arising from the classical doubling method
summary: We define the notion of a non-abelian Jacobi sum $\mathcal{J}^{\mathrm{dbl}}\left(π, χ\right)$ attached to an irreducible representation $π$ of a general linear group or a classical group over a finite field and a character $χ$ of the multiplicative group of the finite field or its quadratic extension. These sums emerge in the study of the doubling method of Piatetski-Shapiro--Rallis and Lapid--Rallis. For general linear groups, we express these non-abelian Jacobi sums in terms of Kondo's non-abelian Gauss sums. For classical groups and for characters that are not conjugate-dual, we give an explicit formula for these non-abelian Jacobi sums in terms of Gauss sums attached to the Deligne--Lusztig data of the representation, and we prove that these Jacobi sums are constant on geometric Lusztig series. Our results rely on a multiplicativity result of non-abelian Jacobi sums obtained by Girsch--Zelingher.

AI.tldr: 该论文定义了有限域上一般线性群或典型群的不可约表示π与乘法群或其二次扩张的特征χ的非阿贝尔雅可比和，研究了其在加倍方法中的应用，并给出了这些和的显式公式。
AI.motivation: 研究Piatetski-Shapiro--Rallis和Lapid--Rallis加倍方法中出现的非阿贝尔雅可比和，探索其在有限域群表示理论中的性质和应用。
AI.method: 定义非阿贝尔雅可比和𝒥ᵈᵇˡ(π,χ)，对于一般线性群用近藤的非阿贝尔高斯和表达，对于典型群和非共轭对偶特征，用Deligne--Lusztig数据的高斯和给出显式公式，并证明其在几何Lusztig系列上的常数性。
AI.result: 成功表达了非阿贝尔雅可比和与已知高斯和的关系，给出了典型群情况下的显式公式，证明了这些和在几何Lusztig系列上的常数性，利用了Girsch--Zelingher的乘法性结果。
AI.conclusion: 非阿贝尔雅可比和是加倍方法中的重要对象，可以通过已知的高斯和显式计算，在几何Lusztig系列上保持常数，为有限域群表示理论提供了新的工具和联系。

title: Structural and Classification Theorems for Weyl-Type Algebras over Expolynomial Rings
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies Weyl-type, Witt-type, and non-associative algebras defined over expolynomial rings -- commutative rings generated by exponential functions $e^{αx}$, exponentials of exponentials $e^{\pm x^p e^{t}}$, and power functions $x^α$ for $α$ in an additive subgroup $\cA$ of a characteristic zero field $\FF$. We establish several fundamental structural results: scalar extensions preserve both the algebraic structure and simplicity; intermediate subalgebras associated with subgroups $\ZZ \subseteq \cB \subseteq \cA$ remain simple; the algebra of graded derivations is isomorphic to a semidirect product $\Weyl{e^{\pm x^p e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}} \rtimes \FF^n$; tensor products over disjoint variable sets decompose naturally into larger algebras; and a complete isomorphism criterion is given, showing that isomorphism depends precisely on the orbit of the parameter $p$ under the automorphism group of $\cA$ and the equality of the deformation parameter $t$. These theorems generalize classical results on Weyl and Witt algebras, provide new families of simple algebras, and offer a foundation for further research in deformation theory, representation theory, and cohomology.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统研究了基于指数多项式环的Weyl型、Witt型和非结合代数，建立了结构保持、简单性保持、导子代数同构、张量积分解和完全同构判据等基本结果。
AI.motivation: 推广经典Weyl和Witt代数的结果，构造新的简单代数族，为变形理论、表示论和上同调研究提供基础。
AI.method: 在指数多项式环上定义Weyl型、Witt型和非结合代数，这些环由指数函数e^{αx}、指数的指数e^{±x^p e^{t}}和幂函数x^α生成，其中α属于特征零域FF的加法子群A。
AI.result: 建立了五个主要结果：标量扩张保持代数结构和简单性；与子群Z⊆B⊆A相关的中间子代数保持简单性；分级导子代数同构于半直积；不相交变量集的张量积自然分解为更大代数；给出了完全同构判据，表明同构取决于参数p在A自同构群下的轨道和变形参数t的相等性。
AI.conclusion: 这些定理推广了经典Weyl和Witt代数的结果，提供了新的简单代数族，为变形理论、表示论和上同调的进一步研究奠定了基础。

title: Structure and Invariants of Weyl-Type Algebras with Exponential Generators
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies a class of Weyl-type algebras enriched with exponential and power generators over a field of characteristic zero, defined as $A_{p,t,\cA} = \Weyl{e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}}$ in the associative setting and $\Nass{e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}}$ in a non-associative framework. We establish fundamental structural properties, including the triviality of the center for the non-associative version and the explicit description $Z(A_{p,t,\cA}) = \FF[e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}}]$ for the associative one, proving that $A_{p,t,\cA}$ is an Azumaya algebra over its center and represents a nontrivial class in the Brauer group $\Br(\FF(y))$. Furthermore, we compute the Gelfand--Kirillov dimension for relevant examples and demonstrate its key properties, such as additivity under tensor products and the growth dichotomy. We completely characterize the automorphism group of $A_{p,t,\cA}$ as a semidirect product of a torus with a discrete group, and provide a sharp isomorphism criterion showing that the parameter $t$ is a complete invariant in the family. The paper concludes with two open problems concerning the GK dimension of non-associative exponential algebras and the classification of their deformations, pointing toward future research directions in non-associative growth theory and deformation rigidity.

AI.tldr: 本文系统研究了一类包含指数和幂生成元的Weyl型代数，包括结合与非结合版本，建立了其中心结构、GK维数、自同构群等基本性质，并提出了两个未解决问题。
AI.motivation: 研究具有指数和幂生成元的Weyl型代数的代数结构，探索结合与非结合框架下的基本性质，为指数代数的分类和变形理论奠定基础。
AI.method: 定义结合代数$A_{p,t,\cA} = \Weyl{e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}}$和非结合代数$\Nass{e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}}$，系统研究其中心结构、GK维数、自同构群等代数性质。
AI.result: 证明了非结合版本的中心是平凡的，结合版本的中心为$\FF[e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}}]$，且$A_{p,t,\cA}$是Azumaya代数；计算了GK维数及其性质；完全刻画了自同构群为环面与离散群的半直积；证明了参数$t$是完备不变量。
AI.conclusion: 系统建立了指数Weyl代数的基本理论框架，提出了两个未解决问题：非结合指数代数的GK维数计算及其变形分类，为未来非结合增长理论和变形刚性研究指明了方向。

title: Rogers-Ramanujan type identities at $Λ_0$ from perfect crystals of exceptional quantum affine algebras
summary: We derive Rogers--Ramanujan type partition identities at the fundamental weight $Λ_0$ for the exceptional affine types $G_2^{(1)}$, $D_4^{(3)}$, $F_4^{(1)}$, $E_6^{(2)}$, $E_6^{(1)}$, $E_7^{(1)}$ and $E_8^{(1)}$. Our starting point is the Dousse--Konan reformulation of the $(\mathrm{KMN})^2$ crystal character formula, applied to the level-one perfect crystal $B=B(θ)\sqcup B(0)$ of Benkart--Frenkel--Kang--Lee with ground element $φ\in B(0)$. This realizes the normalized character $e^{-Λ_0}\mathrm{ch} L(Λ_0)$ as generating functions of grounded $B$-colored partitions governed locally by the crystal energy. After principal specialization, we obtain a colored partition model subject to explicit difference, congruence, and initial conditions. On the product side, under the same specialization, the Weyl--Kac character formula yields an explicit Euler-type product, equivalently the generating function for partitions with parts in a concrete allowed set. Comparing the two specializations gives coefficientwise equalities of generating functions. A key computational feature is that the difference matrix can be produced from the crystal data without explicitly computing the energy function. For each type we tabulate the congruence data, forbidden initial parts, and the full difference matrix, and we provide reproducible coefficient checks.

AI.tldr: 该论文在例外仿射代数类型G₂⁽¹⁾、D₄⁽³⁾、F₄⁽¹⁾、E₆⁽²⁾、E₆⁽¹⁾、E₇⁽¹⁾和E₈⁽¹⁾的Λ₀基本权重处推导了Rogers-Ramanujan型配分恒等式。
AI.motivation: 研究例外仿射代数类型的配分恒等式，将Rogers-Ramanujan型恒等式推广到更广泛的代数结构，探索晶体理论和配分理论之间的深刻联系。
AI.method: 使用Dousse-Konan对(KMN)²晶体特征公式的重新表述，应用于Benkart-Frenkel-Kang-Lee的level-one完美晶体B=B(θ)⊔B(0)。通过主特殊化，得到受晶体能量局部控制的着色配分模型，并与Weyl-Kac特征公式的欧拉型乘积进行比较。
AI.result: 为每种例外仿射类型建立了具体的配分恒等式，包括同余数据、禁止初始部分和完整的差分矩阵，并提供了可重复的系数检验。
AI.conclusion: 成功在例外仿射代数类型的基本权重Λ₀处推导了Rogers-Ramanujan型配分恒等式，展示了晶体能量函数与配分理论之间的深刻联系，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新的组合工具。

title: Degenerate Addition Formulas of the KP hierarchy and Applications
summary: It is well known that tau functions of the KP hierarchy satisfy addition formulas. We consider the general addition formula in the determinant form and take a certain limit of it. It expresses certain shifts of a tau function in terms of the Wronskian determinants of wave functions at various values of the spectral parameter. As an application the relation between solutions created by vertex operators and those created by Darboux transformations is clarified. As another application the new addition formula for Riemann's theta functions of Riemann surfaces is obtained by considering theta function solutions of the KP hierarchy. This addition formula is different from any of formulas in Fay's book.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了KP层次中τ函数的加法公式，通过行列式形式的通用加法公式取极限，建立了τ函数特定平移与不同谱参数下波函数Wronskian行列式之间的关系，并应用于顶点算子解与达布变换解的关系阐明，以及黎曼曲面θ函数新加法公式的推导。
AI.motivation: KP层次中τ函数的加法公式已有广泛研究，但通用加法公式的极限行为及其与波函数Wronskian行列式的关系尚未充分探索。本文旨在通过研究加法公式的极限形式，建立τ函数平移与波函数Wronskian之间的关系，并应用于两个重要问题：顶点算子解与达布变换解的关系，以及黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式推导。
AI.method: 采用行列式形式的通用加法公式，通过取特定极限，将τ函数的特定平移表达为不同谱参数下波函数Wronskian行列式的形式。将此方法应用于KP层次的θ函数解，推导出黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式。
AI.result: 1. 建立了τ函数特定平移与波函数Wronskian行列式之间的明确关系；2. 阐明了顶点算子创建的解与达布变换创建的解之间的关系；3. 获得了与Fay书中所有公式都不同的黎曼曲面θ函数新加法公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过研究KP层次τ函数加法公式的极限行为，本文建立了τ函数平移与波函数Wronskian行列式之间的重要联系，并成功应用于两个重要问题，特别是获得了黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式，为相关数学物理问题的研究提供了新工具。

title: Braid Group Action on $D^b(\mathfrak{M}_η)$
comment: Work is done during ANU-FRT program 2025
summary: We construct an action of the braid group on the bounded derived category of coherent sheaves on hypertoric varieties arising from hyperplane arrangements. Using wall-crossing equivalences associated to paths in the complexified complement of the hyperplane arrangement, we show that these equivalences under certain conditions yield a functor from the Deligne groupoid to the category of triangulated equivalences. This gives rise to a canonical representation of the fundamental group, which recovers the braid group, acting on \(D^b(\mathfrak{M}_η)\). This is a summary of Brad Hannigan-Daley's PhD thesis.

AI.tldr: 该论文在超环面簇的有界导出范畴上构造了辫子群的作用，通过超平面配置补集的复化路径相关的壁交叉等价，在特定条件下得到从Deligne群胚到三角等价范畴的函子，从而获得基本群的典范表示。
AI.motivation: 研究超环面簇的有界导出范畴上的对称性，特别是辫子群在这些几何对象上的作用，探索超平面配置与导出范畴之间的深刻联系。
AI.method: 利用超平面配置的复化补集中的路径相关的壁交叉等价，构造从Deligne群胚到三角等价范畴的函子，从而获得基本群的表示，该表示恢复辫子群在超环面簇导出范畴上的作用。
AI.result: 成功构造了辫子群在超环面簇有界导出范畴上的作用，建立了壁交叉等价与Deligne群胚之间的函子关系，获得了基本群的典范表示。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为超环面簇的导出范畴建立了辫子群的对称性理论，揭示了超平面配置的拓扑性质与代数几何对象范畴结构之间的深刻联系，是Brad Hannigan-Daley博士论文的核心成果。

title: Invariants for isomorphism classes in the category $\bcalNT$
summary: The category $\bcalNT$ is a category of certain commutative graded algebras over a field. It was introduced in \cite{Lobos2} as a generalization of algebras generated by Jucys-Murphy elements in the many \textbf{End} algebras of the diagrammatic Soergel category of Elias and Williamson. In the first part of this article we define certain \emph{Invariants} for the isomorphism classes in $\bcalNT,$ following in the same spirit of \cite{Lobos3}, where a series of \emph{Isomorphism criteria} were found. At the end, we use our invariants to provide a new lower bound for the number of isomorphism classes, improving a similar result obtained in \cite{Lobos3}.

AI.tldr: 本文研究范畴bcalNT中的同构类，定义了新的不变量来改进同构类数量的下界估计
AI.motivation: bcalNT范畴是某些交换分次代数的范畴，最初作为Jucys-Murphy元素生成的代数的推广引入。作者希望扩展先前关于同构判据的研究，为同构类定义新的不变量，从而改进同构类数量的下界估计。
AI.method: 首先为bcalNT范畴中的同构类定义一系列"不变量"，这些不变量遵循先前研究中同构判据的思路。然后利用这些不变量来推导同构类数量的新下界。
AI.result: 成功定义了bcalNT范畴中同构类的新不变量，并利用这些不变量得到了比先前文献中更好的同构类数量下界估计。
AI.conclusion: 通过定义新的不变量，本文改进了bcalNT范畴中同构类数量的下界估计，扩展了该范畴的结构理论研究。

title: Invariant Hilbert spaces of distribution vectors in Lie group representations
comment: 8 pages; accepted for publication in Arkiv för matematik
summary: For every unitary irreducible representation of a Lie group we prove that the representation Hilbert space is the only nonzero invariant Hilbert space of distribution vectors.

AI.tldr: 证明了对于李群的每个酉不可约表示，其表示希尔伯特空间是分布向量中唯一的非零不变希尔伯特子空间
AI.motivation: 研究李群表示理论中分布向量空间的不变子空间结构，探索酉不可约表示的唯一性特征
AI.method: 采用李群表示理论和泛函分析方法，通过分布向量空间的结构分析，证明酉不可约表示的唯一不变性
AI.result: 证明了对于任何李群的酉不可约表示，其表示希尔伯特空间是分布向量空间中唯一的非零不变希尔伯特子空间
AI.conclusion: 该结果为李群表示理论提供了重要的结构性质，表明酉不可约表示在分布向量空间框架下具有唯一的不变希尔伯特子空间结构

title: Failure of Bott vanishing for (co)adjoint partial flag varieties
comment: 10 pages, improved exposition per referee's comments, accepted for publication in Mathematical Research Letters
summary: Bott vanishing is a strong vanishing result for the cohomology of exterior powers of the cotangent bundle twisted by ample line bundles. Buch-Thomsen-Lauritzen-Mehta conjectured that partial flag varieties (which are not products of projective spaces) do not satisfy Bott vanishing, despite all their other nice properties. The cominuscule case is an easy application of the Borel-Weil-Bott theorem, following results of Snow. We show that the (co)adjoint partial flag varieties of all classical and exceptional Dynkin types also do not satisfy Bott vanishing, thus confirming the conjecture for this class of varieties.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了经典和例外Dynkin类型的（共）伴随部分旗簇不满足Bott消失定理，从而证实了Buch-Thomsen-Lauritzen-Mehta猜想对于这类簇成立。
AI.motivation: Bott消失定理是外幂余切丛与丰沛线丛张量积上同调的一个强消失结果。Buch-Thomsen-Lauritzen-Mehta猜想除了射影空间的乘积外，部分旗簇不满足Bott消失定理，尽管它们具有其他良好性质。
AI.method: 对于共极小情况，应用Borel-Weil-Bott定理和Snow的结果。对于经典和例外Dynkin类型的（共）伴随部分旗簇，通过系统分析证明它们不满足Bott消失定理。
AI.result: 证明了所有经典和例外Dynkin类型的（共）伴随部分旗簇都不满足Bott消失定理，从而证实了Buch-Thomsen-Lauritzen-Mehta猜想对于这类簇成立。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为Buch-Thomsen-Lauritzen-Mehta猜想提供了重要证据，表明除了射影空间的乘积外，部分旗簇确实不满足Bott消失定理，深化了对代数几何中消失定理适用范围的理解。

title: Universal geometrical link invariants
summary:
We construct geometrically two universal link invariants: universal ADO invariant and universal Jones invariant, as limits of invariants given by graded intersections in configuration spaces. More specifically, for a fixed level $\mathscr N$, we define new link invariants: ``$\mathscr N^{th}$ Unified Jones invariant'' and ``$\mathscr N^{th}$ Unified Alexander invariant''. They globalise topologically all coloured Jones polynomials for links with multi-colours bounded by $\mathscr N$ and all ADO polynomials with bounded colours. These invariants both come from the same weighted Lagrangian intersection supported on configurations on arcs and ovals in the disc.
  The question of providing a universal non semi-simple link invariant, recovering all the ADO polynomials was an open problem. A parallel question about semi-simple invariants for the case of knots is the subject of Habiro's famous universal knot invariant \cite{H3}. Habiro's universal construction is well defined for knots and can be extended just for certain classes of links. Our universal Jones link invariant is defined for any link and recovers all coloured Jones polynomials, providing a new semi-simple universal link invariant. The first non semi-simple universal link invariant that we construct unifies all ADO invariants for links, answering the open problem about the globalisation of these invariants.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过几何构造方法构建了两个通用链环不变量：通用ADO不变量和通用Jones不变量，作为配置空间中分级交集给出的不变量的极限。
AI.motivation: 解决两个开放性问题：1) 提供能恢复所有ADO多项式的非半单通用链环不变量；2) 构建适用于任意链环（而不仅仅是特定类别）并能恢复所有彩色Jones多项式的半单通用链环不变量。
AI.method: 使用配置空间中加权拉格朗日交集的方法，在圆盘上的弧线和椭圆上构造新的链环不变量。对于固定层级N，定义了"N次统一Jones不变量"和"N次统一Alexander不变量"，这些不变量来自相同的加权拉格朗日交集。
AI.result: 成功构建了第一个非半单通用链环不变量，统一了所有ADO不变量；同时构建了新的半单通用链环不变量，适用于任意链环并能恢复所有彩色Jones多项式，解决了Habiro通用构造仅适用于结和特定链环的限制。
AI.conclusion: 通过几何拓扑方法实现了链环不变量的全局化，解决了关于ADO不变量全局化的开放问题，并为彩色Jones多项式提供了新的通用框架，扩展了Habiro的经典工作。

title: Grothendieck-Springer resolutions and TQFTs
summary:
The Moore-Tachikawa conjecture is that each connected complex semisimple group $G$ determines a two-dimensional TQFT in a category of Hamiltonian symplectic varieties. While it would be worthwhile to prove this conjecture outright, our objectives are drastically different. We instead view the Moore--Tachikawa conjecture as a first step in systematically assigning new TQFTs to purely Lie-theoretic data. At the same time, one should expect these new TQFTs to bear a close relation to those conjectured by Moore and Tachikawa. Our manuscript aims to integrate these two points of view.
  Let $\mathfrak{g}$ be the Lie algebra of $G$. Consider a conjugacy class $\mathcal{C}$ of parabolic subalgebras of $\mathfrak{g}$. This class determines partial Grothendieck--Springer resolutions $μ_{\mathcal{C}}:\mathfrak{g}_{\mathcal{C}}\longrightarrow\mathfrak{g}^*=\mathfrak{g}$ and $ν_{\mathcal{C}}:G_{\mathcal{C}}\longrightarrow G$. We construct a canonical symplectic groupoid $(T^*G)_{\mathcal{C}}\substack{\longrightarrow\\[-9pt] \longrightarrow}\mathfrak{g}_{\mathcal{C}}$ and quasi-symplectic groupoid $\mathrm{D}(G)_{\mathcal{C}}\substack{\longrightarrow\\[-9pt] \longrightarrow} G_{\mathcal{C}}$. By considering a Kostant slice $\mathrm{Kos}\subseteq\mathfrak{g}$ and Steinberg slice $\mathrm{Ste}\subseteq G$, we prove that the pairs $(((T^*G)_{\mathcal{C}})_{\text{reg}}\substack{\longrightarrow\\[-9pt] \longrightarrow}(\mathfrak{g}_{\mathcal{C}})_{\text{reg}},μ_{\mathcal{C}}^{-1}(\mathrm{Kos}))$ and $((\mathrm{D}(G)_{\mathcal{C}})_{\text{reg}}\substack{\longrightarrow\\[-9pt] \longrightarrow}(G_{\mathcal{C}})_{\text{reg}},ν_{\mathcal{C}}^{-1}(\mathrm{Ste}))$ determine new and explicit TQFTs in a $1$-shifted Weinstein symplectic category. We then show that certain symplectic varieties arising from our new TQFTs have canonical Lagrangian relations to the open Moore-Tachikawa varieties.

AI.tldr: 该论文基于Moore-Tachikawa猜想，从李理论数据构造新的TQFT，通过抛物子代数共轭类建立部分Grothendieck-Springer分解，构造规范辛群胚和拟辛群胚，并证明这些结构在1-位移Weinstein辛范畴中确定新的显式TQFT。
AI.motivation: 将Moore-Tachikawa猜想视为从纯李理论数据系统分配新TQFT的第一步，同时期望这些新TQFT与Moore和Tachikawa猜想的TQFT密切相关，旨在整合这两种观点。
AI.method: 利用李代数g的抛物子代数共轭类C，构造部分Grothendieck-Springer分解μ_C:g_C→g*和ν_C:G_C→G。建立规范辛群胚(T^*G)_C→g_C和拟辛群胚D(G)_C→G_C。通过Kostant切片Kos⊆g和Steinberg切片Ste⊆G，证明正则化后的群胚对在1-位移Weinstein辛范畴中确定新的显式TQFT。
AI.result: 证明了从抛物子代数共轭类构造的辛群胚结构在正则化后与特定切片结合，在1-位移Weinstein辛范畴中产生新的显式TQFT。同时表明这些新TQFT产生的辛簇与开放的Moore-Tachikawa簇具有规范的拉格朗日关系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功地从李理论数据系统构造了新的TQFT，建立了与Moore-Tachikawa猜想中TQFT的密切联系，为从纯代数结构生成量子场论提供了新的框架和方法。

title: Infinitesimal $\mathcal{R}$-matrices for some families of Hopf algebras
comment: 27 pages. Added Section 3. Minor changes throughout the paper. Additional references
summary: Given a bialgebra $H$ such that the associated trivial topological bialgebra $H[[\hbar]]$ admits a quasitriangular structure $\tilde{\mathcal{R}}=\mathcal{R}(1\otimes 1+\hbarχ+\mathcal{O}(\hbar^2))$, one gets a distinguished element $χ\in H \otimes H$ which is an infinitesimal $\mathcal{R}$-matrix, according to the definition given in [1]. In this paper we classify infinitesimal $\mathcal{R}$-matrices for some families of well-known Hopf algebras, among which are the generalized Kac-Paljutkin Hopf algebras $H_{2n^2}$, the Radford Hopf algebras $H_{(r,n,q)}$, and the Hopf algebras $E(n)$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了双代数H的无穷小R矩阵分类问题，针对几类已知Hopf代数进行了系统分类
AI.motivation: 当双代数H的平凡拓扑双代数H[[ħ]]存在拟三角结构时，会得到一个特殊的无穷小R矩阵χ。本文旨在对几类重要Hopf代数的无穷小R矩阵进行完整分类
AI.method: 使用代数方法分析广义Kac-Paljutkin Hopf代数H_{2n^2}、Radford Hopf代数H_{(r,n,q)}和E(n) Hopf代数的结构，推导并分类这些代数中所有可能的无穷小R矩阵
AI.result: 成功完成了对三类重要Hopf代数（广义Kac-Paljutkin、Radford和E(n)）的无穷小R矩阵的完整分类，给出了这些代数中所有可能的无穷小R矩阵的具体形式
AI.conclusion: 本文系统分类了几类重要Hopf代数的无穷小R矩阵，为相关代数结构的研究提供了理论基础，这些结果有助于进一步理解拟三角结构和量子群理论

title: Lifting Brauer indecomposability of a Scott module
summary: It is proven that if a finite group $G$ has a normal subgroup $H$ with $p'$-index (where $p$ is a prime) and $G/H$ is solvable, then for a $p$-subgroup $P$ of $H$, if the Scott $kH$-module with vertex $P$ is Brauer indecomposable, then so is the Scott $kG$-module with vertex $P$, where $k$ is a field of characteristic $p>0$. This has several applications.

AI.tldr: 证明了当有限群G有p'-指数正规子群H且G/H可解时，如果Scott kH-模关于顶点P是Brauer不可分解的，那么Scott kG-模关于顶点P也是Brauer不可分解的
AI.motivation: 研究群表示论中Scott模的Brauer不可分解性质在群扩张下的保持问题，特别是当群有特定结构的正规子群时
AI.method: 使用有限群表示论方法，特别是模表示论技术，分析具有p'-指数正规子群的群结构，研究Scott模在群扩张下的性质保持
AI.result: 证明了在给定条件下，Scott kH-模的Brauer不可分解性可以提升到Scott kG-模的Brauer不可分解性
AI.conclusion: 该结果为研究群表示中模的不可分解性质提供了新的工具，并有几个应用

title: Filtering the linearization of the category of surjections
comment: v5; Journal version; 26 pages. (v4: very minor revision. v3: Improvements to the exposition; 15 pages. v2: Minor revision; 13 pages. v1: 14 pages.)
summary:
A filtration of the morphisms of the $k$-linearization $k \mathbf{FS}$ of the category $\mathbf{FS}$ of finite sets and surjections is constructed using a natural $k \mathbf{FI}^{op}$-module structure induced by restriction, where $\mathbf{FI}$ is the category of finite sets and injections. In particular, this yields the `primitive' subcategory $ k \mathbf{FS}^0 \subset k \mathbf{FS}$ that is of independent interest; for example, the category of $k \mathbf{FS}^0$-modules is closely related to the category of $k \mathbf{FA}$-modules, where $\mathbf{FA}$ is the category of finite sets and all maps.
  Working over a field of characteristic zero, the subquotients of this filtration are identified as bimodules over $k \mathbf{FB}$, where $\mathbf{FB}$ is the category of finite sets and bijections, also exhibiting and exploiting additional structure. In particular, this describes the underlying $k \mathbf{FB}$-bimodule of $k \mathbf{FS}^0$.

AI.tldr: 本文通过限制诱导的自然$k\mathbf{FI}^{op}$-模结构，构造了有限集与满射范畴$\mathbf{FS}$的$k$-线性化$k\mathbf{FS}$的态射滤过，并特别定义了"本原"子范畴$k\mathbf{FS}^0$。在特征零域上，该滤过的子商被识别为$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模，并描述了$k\mathbf{FS}^0$的底层$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模结构。
AI.motivation: 研究有限集与满射范畴$\mathbf{FS}$的$k$-线性化$k\mathbf{FS}$的结构，通过利用限制诱导的$k\mathbf{FI}^{op}$-模结构来构造态射的滤过。特别关注"本原"子范畴$k\mathbf{FS}^0$，它与$k\mathbf{FA}$-模范畴密切相关，其中$\mathbf{FA}$是有限集与所有映射的范畴。
AI.method:
1. 利用限制诱导的自然$k\mathbf{FI}^{op}$-模结构构造$k\mathbf{FS}$态射的滤过
2. 定义"本原"子范畴$k\mathbf{FS}^0 \subset k\mathbf{FS}$
3. 在特征零域上工作，将滤过的子商识别为$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模
4. 展示并利用额外的结构来描述$k\mathbf{FS}^0$的底层$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模
AI.result:
1. 成功构造了$k\mathbf{FS}$态射的滤过
2. 定义了具有独立意义的"本原"子范畴$k\mathbf{FS}^0$
3. 在特征零域上，证明了滤过的子商是$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模
4. 完整描述了$k\mathbf{FS}^0$的底层$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模结构
AI.conclusion: 本文通过构造$k\mathbf{FS}$的滤过，揭示了其与相关范畴（$\mathbf{FI}$, $\mathbf{FB}$, $\mathbf{FA}$）之间的深刻联系。特别地，在特征零域上，该滤过的子商具有$k\mathbf{FB}$-双模结构，为理解$k\mathbf{FS}^0$-模与$k\mathbf{FA}$-模之间的关系提供了重要工具。

title: Central motives on parahoric flag varieties
comment: Final version, to appear in Journal of the European Mathematical Society
summary: We construct a refinement of Gaitsgory's central functor for integral motivic sheaves, and show it preserves stratified Tate motives. Towards this end, we develop a reformulation of unipotent motivic nearby cycles, which also works over higher-dimensional bases. We moreover introduce Wakimoto motives and use them to show that our motivic central functor is t-exact. A decategorification of these functors yields a new approach to generic Hecke algebras for general parahorics.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了Gaitsgory中心函子的精细化版本，证明其保持分层Tate动机，并发展了单式动机邻近循环的新表述，同时引入Wakimoto动机来证明动机中心函子的t-正合性。
AI.motivation: 研究动机积分动机层的中心函子，旨在发展更精细的理论框架，特别是针对分层Tate动机的保持性质，并为一般抛物子群的泛Hecke代数提供新的方法。
AI.method: 1. 构建Gaitsgory中心函子的精细化版本；2. 发展单式动机邻近循环的新表述，适用于高维基；3. 引入Wakimoto动机概念；4. 利用Wakimoto动机证明动机中心函子的t-正合性。
AI.result: 成功构建了保持分层Tate动机的中心函子精细化版本，发展了适用于高维基的单式动机邻近循环理论，证明了动机中心函子的t-正合性，并为一般抛物子群的泛Hecke代数提供了新的范畴化方法。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为动机层理论提供了重要的技术工具，特别是中心函子的精细化和Wakimoto动机的引入，为Hecke代数的范畴化研究开辟了新途径，具有重要的理论意义。

title: Geometric universal Jones invariant from configurations on ovals in the disc
comment: The initial article has been split into two parts: this is part one, constructing geometric universal invariants for knots, and comes with a second part, providing universal link invariants. 58 pages, comments welcome
summary:
We construct geometrically a universal Jones invariant as a limit of invariants given by graded intersections in configuration spaces. For any fixed level $\mathscr N$, we define a new knot invariant, called ``$\mathscr N^{th}$ Unified Jones invariant'' globalising topologically all coloured Jones polynomials at levels less than $\mathscr N$. It is defined via the intersection points between {Lagrangian submanifolds} supported on arcs and ovals in the disc. The geometry of these Lagrangians is novel: previous topological models involved immersed submanifolds rather than embedded ones. We do this by defining a new local system that refines the Lawrence representation, and depends of the distribution of multiplicities of points in the configuration space on the ovals.
  On the algebraic side, Habiro's famous invariant for knots \cite{H3} is a universal invariant globalising the family of coloured Jones polynomials. He conjectured that this universal invariant recovers also the ADO invariant divided by the Alexander polynomials, which was proved by Willetts \cite{W} in a version of Habiro's ring (\cite{H2}). The universal Jones invariant that we construct belongs to a different ring that comes with a map to Habiro's ring \cite{H2}.
  We prove that our invariant recovers this version of Habiro's invariant. The difference is that our invariant is given as a limit of new knot invariants, the $\mathscr N^{th}$ unified Jones invariants. These invariants in turn provide a geometrical understanding of sets of all coloured Jones polynomials of bounded colour, collecting more information as we increase the colour.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过配置空间中拉格朗日子流形的几何相交构造了一个通用琼斯不变量，统一了所有有界颜色的彩色琼斯多项式。
AI.motivation: 动机是几何地构造一个通用琼斯不变量，从拓扑角度统一所有有界颜色的彩色琼斯多项式，同时为Habiro的著名不变量提供几何理解。
AI.method: 方法是通过在圆盘上的弧和椭圆上定义新的拉格朗日子流形，利用配置空间中点的多重性分布定义新的局部系统，通过拉格朗日子流形的相交点定义第N统一琼斯不变量。
AI.result: 结果构造了一个通用琼斯不变量作为新结不变量的极限，这些新不变量全局化了所有颜色小于N的彩色琼斯多项式，并证明了该不变量恢复Habiro不变量的版本。
AI.conclusion: 结论是成功几何构造了通用琼斯不变量，提供了对彩色琼斯多项式集合的几何理解，这些不变量随着颜色增加收集更多信息，属于与Habiro环不同的环。

title: Piecewise hereditary algebras under field extensions
summary: Let $A$ be a finite-dimensional $k$-algebra and $K/k$ be a finite separable field extension. We prove that $A$ is derived equivalent to a hereditary algebra if and only if so is $A\otimes_kK$.

AI.tldr: 证明了有限维k-代数A与遗传代数导出等价当且仅当其张量积A⊗_kK与遗传代数导出等价，其中K/k是有限可分域扩张。
AI.motivation: 研究有限维代数在基域扩张下的导出等价性质，特别是与遗传代数的导出等价关系在基域扩张下的保持性。
AI.method: 利用有限可分域扩张的性质，通过代数表示论和导出范畴理论的方法，分析张量积代数的导出等价性质。
AI.result: 证明了A与遗传代数导出等价当且仅当A⊗_kK与遗传代数导出等价，建立了基域扩张下导出等价性质的等价关系。
AI.conclusion: 有限可分域扩张不会改变有限维代数与遗传代数之间的导出等价关系，这一结果为研究代数在基域变化下的表示性质提供了重要工具。

title: The derived-discrete algebras over the real numbers
summary: We classify derived-discrete algebras over the real numbers up to Morita equivalence, using the classification of complex derived-discrete algebras in [{\sc D. Vossieck}, {\em The algebras with discrete derived category}, J. Algebra {\bf 243} (2001), 168--176]. To this end, we investigate the quiver presentation of the complexified algebra of a real algebra given by a modulated quiver and an admissible ideal.

AI.tldr: 该论文对实数域上的导出离散代数进行了Morita等价分类，利用复数域上导出离散代数的已有分类结果，通过研究由调制箭图给出的实代数的复化代数的箭图表示来实现。
AI.motivation: 实数域上的导出离散代数分类问题尚未解决，而复数域上的分类已有结果。研究实代数通过复化与复数域代数的关系，可以建立实数域上的分类体系。
AI.method: 利用复数域导出离散代数的分类结果，研究由调制箭图和可容许理想给出的实代数的复化代数的箭图表示，建立实代数与复代数之间的对应关系。
AI.result: 完成了实数域上导出离散代数到Morita等价类的完整分类，建立了实代数分类与复数域代数分类之间的联系。
AI.conclusion: 通过研究实代数的复化代数的箭图结构，成功将复数域上的导出离散代数分类结果推广到实数域，解决了实数域上的分类问题。

title: Derived Representation Type and Field Extensions
summary: Let $A$ be a finite-dimensional algebra over a field $k$. We define $A$ to be $\mathbf{C}$-dichotomic if it has the dichotomy property of the representation type on complexes of projective $A$-modules. $\mathbf{C}$-dichotomy implies the dichotomy properties of representation type on the levels of homotopy category and derived category. If $k$ admits a finite separable field extension $K/k$ such that $K$ is algebraically closed, the real number field for example, we prove that $A$ is $\mathbf{C}$-dichotomic. As a consequence, the second derived Brauer-Thrall type theorem holds for $A$, i.e., $A$ is either derived discrete or strongly derived unbounded.

AI.tldr: 该论文定义了C-二分性代数，证明了在特定条件下有限维代数具有C-二分性，并推导出第二类导出Brauer-Thrall定理
AI.motivation: 研究有限维代数在复形、同伦范畴和导出范畴层面的表示类型二分性质，建立代数表示类型与导出范畴行为之间的联系
AI.method: 定义C-二分性代数，研究其在射影模复形上的表示类型二分性质，利用域扩张技术（特别是有限可分扩张到代数闭域或实数域），证明在特定条件下代数具有C-二分性
AI.result: 证明了当k存在有限可分扩张K/k且K代数闭（如实数域）时，有限维代数A具有C-二分性，从而导出第二类Brauer-Thrall定理：A要么是导出离散的，要么是强导出无界的
AI.conclusion: C-二分性为研究代数表示类型提供了新视角，在适当域条件下有限维代数必然具有表示类型的二分性质，这统一了复形、同伦范畴和导出范畴层面的表示类型行为

title: Algebra extensions and derived-discrete algebras
summary: Let $φ\colon A\rightarrow B$ be an algebra extension. We prove that if $φ$ is split, the derived-discreteness of $A$ implies the derived-discreteness of $B$; if $φ$ is separable and the right $A$-module $B$ is projective, the converse holds. We prove an analogous statement for piecewise hereditary algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了代数扩张与导出离散性之间的关系，证明了分裂扩张保持导出离散性，而可分扩张在特定条件下具有反向性质
AI.motivation: 研究代数扩张如何影响导出离散性这一代数表示论中的重要性质，探索在不同类型的代数扩张下导出离散性的传递关系
AI.method: 使用代数表示论的方法，分析分裂扩张和可分扩张两种不同类型的代数扩张，结合模论中的投射性条件，建立导出离散性的传递定理
AI.result: 证明了：1) 如果代数扩张是分裂的，则A的导出离散性蕴含B的导出离散性；2) 如果扩张是可分的且右A-模B是投射的，则反向蕴含也成立；3) 对分片遗传代数建立了类似的结论
AI.conclusion: 代数扩张的类型和模论性质共同决定了导出离散性的传递关系，分裂扩张保持导出离散性，而可分扩张在投射性条件下具有双向传递性
